name: Being a local in Vietnam
description:
This is a great opportunity to feel the rythm of local daily life in Nhatrang. Enjoy a relaxing ride on the scooter along the beach side of Nha Trang in a refreshing morning breeze. Visiting some tourist attractions with local to share culture, story of each place passed by. A break with vietnamese coffee in a really really local place, there is nowhere except coffee on pavement. By this way you are no longer a tourist who just come and see but now you are a local. Then heading to Xom moi market as a local shopper and experience the feeling of bargain by vietnamese languagues. before tour end a perfect lunch is waiting for you in a place that you rarely to find someone like you but us LOCAL people.
Objectives: 
Create opportunities for foreignes to explore the local scenic and historical sites; learn about traditional customs, craft villages, and Vietnamese cuisine.
Build avenues for Vietnamese students to learn and interact with international peers and facilitate in the effort of the nation’s culture preservation.
30% of price will be saved to execute community projects & social work to support children, the disabled and the less fortunate.  
Raise awareness in nature and environment conservations.
